name: TV App Artikel MDR Visits Differenz

targets.rawSql:
IF "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde"
THEN 
WITH current_value AS (
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS current_sum
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      --publishing_date,
      FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (
        PARTITION BY uuid
        ORDER BY
          publishing_date DESC
      ) as publishing_date,
      FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (
        PARTITION BY uuid
        ORDER BY
          publishing_date DESC
      ) as content_id_sophora,
      m_visits,
      m_page_loads,
      FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (
        PARTITION BY uuid
        ORDER BY
          publishing_date DESC
      ) as content_titel
    FROM
      `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
    WHERE
      site_level2 = '${app_name}'
      AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
      AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
      AND (
        CASE
          WHEN "$LRA" = 'NDR' THEN content_titel NOT LIKE '%Video Livestream%'
          AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%Startteaser%'
          AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%startteaser%'
          AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%-Anmelden%'
          AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%_Start'
          AND content_titel != 'Anmelden'
          AND content_titel != 'Jetzt l√§uft'
          ELSE TRUE
        END
      )
      AND $Zeitraum
  )


), past_value AS (
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS past_sum
FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits`
WHERE site_level2 = ${app_name:doublequote}
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum
)
-- SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference
SELECT CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND(((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100,1) as string), ".", ","), "%") FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference;
ELSE

WITH current_value AS (
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS current_sum
FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${dataset_visits_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = ${app_name:doublequote}
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum

), past_value AS (
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS past_sum
FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits`
WHERE site_level2 = ${app_name:doublequote}
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum
)
-- SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference;
SELECT CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND(((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100,1) as string), ".", ","), "%") FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference;
END IF
